publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5997 James Kelly: Congratulations to the Toryglen Community Council in Securing an Awards for All Scotland Grant—That the Parliament notes the announcement that the Toryglen Community Council has been successful in securing a funding grant of £664 from the Big Lottery Fund Awards for All Scotland that will enable the group to purchase IT equipment, increasing its capacity to better represent the local community’s views, allowing its community to be safer, stronger and more able to work together to tackle inequalities, and congratulates all members of the Toryglen Community Council for their excellent contribution to the local community.

S3M-5997 James Kelly: Congratulations to the Toryglen Community Council in Securing an Awards for All Scotland Grant—That the Parliament notes the announcement that the Toryglen Community Council has been successful in securing a funding grant of £664 from the Big Lottery Fund Awards for All Scotland that will enable the group to purchase IT equipment, increasing its capacity to better represent the local community’s views, allowing its community to be safer, stronger and more able to work together to tackle inequalities, and congratulates all members of the Toryglen Community Council for their excellent contribution to the local community.
S3M-5997 Congratulations to the Toryglen Community Council in Securing an Awards for All Scotland Grant (lodged on 18 March 2010) Jackie Baillie*, Helen Eadie*, Trish Godman*
